name: Slapsgiving 2: Revenge of the Slap
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Jamie Rhonheimer, Robia Rashid (executive story editor), Matt Kuhn (story)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Barney freaks out when Marshall bequeaths a "slap bet" slap to Ted and Robin. Meanwhile, Lily's estranged father shows up for Thanksgiving.
